A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was horrible. Star Wars turned from sci-fi to comedy. Also the plot is meaningless. There isn't a single thing of the movie that I liked. It's clear that Disney is trying to sell the movie to the kids\, and to sell toys with the new fluffy animal. \nPoe and Finn are completely useless in regards of the plot. If they have 't been in the movie it wouldn't have changed a thing for the overall plot\, they have been just an annoying filler for Rey's training.\nThere would be so much to say but I don't want to do spoilers for who didn't saw the movie.
